patthana3.13:1.1.pli: Nadassanena pahātabbaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nadassanena pahātabbo kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.13:2.1.pli: Hetuyā ekaṃ, ārammaṇe ekaṃ, adhipatiyā ekaṃ …pe… avigate ekaṃ. (Saṅkhittaṃ. Sahajātavārepi …pe… pañhāvārepi sabbattha ekaṃ.)

patthana3.13:3.1.pli: Dassanena pahātabbaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca dassanena pahātabbo akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.13:4.1.pli: Hetuyā dve, ārammaṇe dve, adhipatiyā dve …pe… avigate dve. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.13:5.1.pli: Dassanena pahātabbaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca dassanena pahātabbo akusalo dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—vicikicchāsahagate khandhe paṭicca vicikicchāsahagato moho.

patthana3.13:6.1.pli: Nadassanena pahātabbaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nadassanena pahātabbo akusalo dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā.  (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.13:7.1.pli: Nahetuyā dve, naadhipatiyā dve, napurejāte dve …pe… nakamme dve, navipāke dve, navippayutte dve. (Saṅkhittaṃ. Sahajātavārepi …pe… sampayuttavārepi sabbattha vitthāretabbaṃ.)

patthana3.13:8.1.pli: Dassanena pahātabbo akusalo dhammo dassanena pahātabbassa akusalassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.

patthana3.13:9.1.pli: Nadassanena pahātabbo akusalo dhammo nadassanena pahātabbassa akusalassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.  (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.13:10.1.pli: Hetuyā dve, ārammaṇe tīṇi (dassane ekaṃ, nadassane dve), adhipatiyā tīṇi (dassanena pahātabbamūlakaṃ ekaṃ, nadassane dve, ārammaṇādhipati, sahajātādhipati, ekārammaṇādhipati), anantare dve (dassanamūlakaṃ ekaṃ, nadassane ekaṃ), samanantare dve, sahajāte dve …pe… upanissaye tīṇi, āsevane dve, kamme dve, āhāre dve …pe… sampayutte dve, atthiyā dve, natthiyā dve …pe… avigate dve. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.13:11.1.pli: Nadassanena pahātabbaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nadassanena pahātabbo abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.13:12.1.pli: Hetuyā ekaṃ, ārammaṇe ekaṃ …pe… avigate ekaṃ. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.13:14.1.pli: Nabhāvanāya pahātabbaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nabhāvanāya pahātabbo kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.13:15.1.pli: Hetuyā ekaṃ, ārammaṇe ekaṃ …pe… avigate ekaṃ. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.13:17.1.pli: Bhāvanāya pahātabbaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca bhāvanāya pahātabbo akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.13:18.1.pli: Hetuyā dve, ārammaṇe dve …pe… avigate dve. (Saṅkhittaṃ. Dassanena pahātabbadukaakusalasadisaṃ. Sahajātavārepi …pe… pañhāvārepi sabbattha vitthāretabbaṃ.)

patthana3.13:19.1.pli: Nabhāvanāya pahātabbaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nabhāvanāya pahātabbo abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.13:20.1.pli: Hetuyā ekaṃ, ārammaṇe ekaṃ …pe… avigate ekaṃ. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.13:22.1.pli: Nadassanena pahātabbahetukaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nadassanena pahātabbahetuko kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.13:23.1.pli: Hetuyā ekaṃ, ārammaṇe ekaṃ …pe… avigate ekaṃ. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.13:25.1.pli: Dassanena pahātabbahetukaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca dassanena pahātabbahetuko akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.

patthana3.13:26.1.pli: Nadassanena pahātabbahetukaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nadassanena pahātabbahetuko akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nadassanena pahātabbahetukaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca dassanena pahātabbahetuko akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.

patthana3.13:27.1.pli: Dassanena pahātabbahetukaṃ akusalañca nadassanena pahātabbahetukaṃ akusalañca dhammaṃ paṭicca dassanena pahātabbahetuko akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.

patthana3.13:28.1.pli: Dassanena pahātabbahetukaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca dassanena pahātabbahetuko akusalo dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā … tīṇi. (Nadassane dve, ghaṭane ekaṃ, saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.13:29.1.pli: Hetuyā cattāri, ārammaṇe cha, adhipatiyā dve (sabbattha cha), avigate cha. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.13:30.1.pli: Dassanena pahātabbahetukaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nadassanena pahātabbahetuko akusalo dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā.

patthana3.13:31.1.pli: Nadassanena pahātabbahetukaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nadassanena pahātabbahetuko akusalo dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.13:32.1.pli: Nahetuyā dve, naadhipatiyā cha …pe… nakamme cattāri, navipāke cha, navippayutte cha. (Saṅkhittaṃ. Sahajātavārādi vitthāretabbo.)

patthana3.13:33.1.pli: Dassanena pahātabbahetuko akusalo dhammo dassanena pahātabbahetukassa akusalassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.13:34.1.pli: Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā tīṇi (dassane ekaṃ, nadassane dve), anantare nava, samanantare nava, sahajāte cha …pe… upanissaye nava, āsevane nava, kamme cattāri, āhāre cattāri, indriye cattāri …pe… sampayutte cha, atthiyā cha, natthiyā nava …pe… avigate cha. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.13:35.1.pli: Nadassanena pahātabbahetukaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nadassanena pahātabbahetuko abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.13:36.1.pli: Hetuyā ekaṃ, ārammaṇe ekaṃ …pe… avigate ekaṃ. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.13:38.1.pli: Nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetukaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.13:39.1.pli: Hetuyā ekaṃ, ārammaṇe ekaṃ …pe… avigate ekaṃ. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.13:41.1.pli: Bhāvanāya pahātabbahetukaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca bhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.

patthana3.13:42.1.pli: Nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetukaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.13:43.1.pli: Hetuyā cattāri, ārammaṇe cha, adhipatiyā dve …pe… avigate cha. (Saṅkhittaṃ. Dassanena pahātabbahetukadukaakusalasadisaṃ. Sahajātavārepi …pe… pañhāvārepi sabbattha vitthāretabbaṃ.)

patthana3.13:44.1.pli: Nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetukaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.13:45.1.pli: Hetuyā ekaṃ, ārammaṇe ekaṃ …pe… avigate ekaṃ. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.13:47.1.pli: Savitakkaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca savitakko kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Savitakkaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca avitakko kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Savitakkaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca savitakko kusalo ca avitakko kusalo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.

patthana3.13:48.1.pli: Avitakkaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca avitakko kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Avitakkaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca savitakko kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.

patthana3.13:49.1.pli: Savitakkaṃ kusalañca avitakkaṃ kusalañca dhammaṃ paṭicca savitakko kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.  (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.13:50.1.pli: Hetuyā cha, ārammaṇe cha (sabbattha cha), avigate cha. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.13:51.1.pli: Naadhipatiyā cha, napurejāte cha …pe… nakamme cattāri …pe… navippayutte cha. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.13:53.1.pli: Savitakko kusalo dhammo savitakkassa kusalassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. Savitakko kusalo dhammo avitakkassa kusalassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. Savitakko kusalo dhammo savitakkassa kusalassa ca avitakkassa kusalassa ca dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.

patthana3.13:54.1.pli: Avitakko kusalo dhammo avitakkassa kusalassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.

patthana3.13:55.1.pli: Savitakko kusalo dhammo savitakkassa kusalassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.

patthana3.13:56.1.pli: Avitakko kusalo dhammo avitakkassa kusalassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.

patthana3.13:57.1.pli: Savitakko kusalo ca avitakko kusalo ca dhammā savitakkassa kusalassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.13:58.1.pli: Hetuyā cattāri, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā nava (heṭṭhā tīsu sahajātādhipati, avitakke ekaṃ, sahajātādhipati), anantare nava, samanantare nava, sahajāte cha …pe… upanissaye nava, āsevane nava, kamme cattāri, āhāre cattāri, indriye cattāri, jhāne cha, magge cha, sampayutte cha, atthiyā cha, natthiyā nava, vigate nava, avigate cha. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.13:63.1.pli: Savitakkaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca savitakko akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Savitakkaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca avitakko akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Savitakkaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca savitakko akusalo ca avitakko akusalo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.

patthana3.13:64.1.pli: Avitakkaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca savitakko akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.

patthana3.13:65.1.pli: Savitakkaṃ akusalañca avitakkaṃ akusalañca dhammaṃ paṭicca savitakko akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.  (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.13:66.1.pli: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe pañca (sabbattha pañca) …pe… avigate pañca. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.13:67.1.pli: Savitakkaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca savitakko akusalo dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā.

patthana3.13:68.1.pli: Avitakkaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca savitakko akusalo dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā.

patthana3.13:69.1.pli: Savitakkaṃ akusalañca avitakkaṃ akusalañca dhammaṃ paṭicca savitakko akusalo dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā.  (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.13:70.1.pli: Nahetuyā tīṇi, naadhipatiyā pañca, nakamme tīṇi …pe… navippayutte pañca. (Saṅkhittaṃ. Sahajātavārādi vitthāretabbo.)

patthana3.13:71.1.pli: Savitakko akusalo dhammo savitakkassa akusalassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.13:72.1.pli: Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā nava, anantare nava …pe… sahajāte pañca …pe… upanissaye nava, āsevane nava, kamme tīṇi, āhāre tīṇi …pe… jhāne pañca, magge pañca, sampayutte pañca, atthiyā pañca, natthiyā nava …pe… avigate pañca. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.13:73.1.pli: Savitakkaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca savitakko abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.

patthana3.13:74.1.pli: Avitakkaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca avitakko abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.

patthana3.13:75.1.pli: Savitakkaṃ abyākatañca avitakkaṃ abyākatañca dhammaṃ paṭicca savitakko abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.13:76.1.pli: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe nava …pe… purejāte āsevane cha …pe… avigate nava. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.13:77.1.pli: Nahetuyā nava, naārammaṇe tīṇi, naadhipatiyā nava …pe… napurejāte nava …pe… nakamme cattāri, navipāke nava, naāhāre ekaṃ, naindriye ekaṃ, najhāne ekaṃ, namagge nava, nasampayutte tīṇi, navippayutte cha …pe… novigate tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṃ. Sahajātavārampi …pe… sampayuttavārampi vitthāretabbaṃ.)

patthana3.13:78.1.pli: Savitakko abyākato dhammo savitakkassa abyākatassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.

patthana3.13:79.1.pli: Avitakko abyākato dhammo avitakkassa abyākatassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.

patthana3.13:80.1.pli: Savitakko abyākato dhammo savitakkassa abyākatassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.13:81.1.pli: Hetuyā cattāri, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā nava (sabbattha nava), upanissaye nava, purejāte tīṇi, pacchājāte tīṇi, āsevane nava, kamme cattāri, vipāke nava, āhāre cattāri …pe… jhāne nava, magge nava, sampayutte cha, vippayutte pañca, atthiyā nava, natthiyā nava, vigate nava, avigate nava. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.13:86.1.pli: Savicāraṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca savicāro kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.

patthana3.13:87.1.pli: Avicāraṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca avicāro kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … dve.

patthana3.13:88.1.pli: Savicāraṃ kusalañca avicāraṃ kusalañca dhammaṃ paṭicca savicāro kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.  (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.13:89.1.pli: Hetuyā cha, ārammaṇe cha …pe… avigate cha. (Saṅkhittaṃ. Savitakkadukakusalasadisaṃ. Sahajātavārampi …pe… pañhāvārampi vitthāretabbaṃ.)

patthana3.13:90.1.pli: Savicāraṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca savicāro akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.

patthana3.13:91.1.pli: Avicāraṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca savicāro akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.

patthana3.13:92.1.pli: Savicāraṃ akusalañca avicāraṃ akusalañca dhammaṃ paṭicca savicāro akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.  (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.13:93.1.pli: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe pañca …pe… avigate pañca. (Saṅkhittaṃ. Savitakkadukaakusalasadisaṃ. Sahajātavārampi …pe… pañhāvārampi vitthāretabbaṃ.)

patthana3.13:94.1.pli: Savicāraṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca savicāro abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.

patthana3.13:95.1.pli: Avicāraṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca avicāro abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.

patthana3.13:96.1.pli: Savicāraṃ abyākatañca avicāraṃ abyākatañca dhammaṃ paṭicca savicāro abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.13:97.1.pli: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe nava …pe… purejāte āsevane cha …pe… vipāke nava …pe… avigate nava. (Saṅkhittaṃ. Savitakkadukaabyākatasadisaṃ. Sahajātavāropi …pe… sampayuttavāropi vitthāretabbā.)

patthana3.13:98.1.pli: Savicāro abyākato dhammo savicārassa abyākatassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.13:99.1.pli: Hetuyā cattāri, ārammaṇe nava …pe… magge cattāri …pe… avigate nava. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.13:104.1.pli: Sappītikaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sappītiko kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Sappītikaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca appītiko kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Sappītikaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sappītiko kusalo ca appītiko kusalo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.

patthana3.13:105.1.pli: Appītikaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca appītiko kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Appītikaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sappītiko kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.

patthana3.13:106.1.pli: Sappītikaṃ kusalañca appītikaṃ kusalañca dhammaṃ paṭicca sappītiko kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.  (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.13:108.1.pli: Naadhipatiyā cha, napurejāte cha …pe… nakamme cattāri, navippayutte cha. (Saṅkhittaṃ. Sahajātavārampi …pe… sampayuttavārampi vitthāretabbaṃ.)

patthana3.13:109.1.pli: Sappītiko kusalo dhammo sappītikassa kusalassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.

patthana3.13:110.1.pli: Appītiko kusalo dhammo appītikassa kusalassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.

patthana3.13:111.1.pli: Sappītiko kusalo dhammo sappītikassa kusalassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.13:112.1.pli: Hetuyā cattāri, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā nava (cattāri sahajātādhipati), anantare nava, samanantare nava, sahajāte cha …pe… upanissaye nava, āsevane nava, kamme cattāri, āhāre cattāri, indriye cattāri, jhāne cha, magge cattāri, sampayutte cha, atthiyā cha, natthiyā nava, vigate nava, avigate cha. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.13:117.1.pli: Sappītikaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sappītiko akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.

patthana3.13:118.1.pli: Appītikaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca appītiko akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … dve.

patthana3.13:119.1.pli: Sappītikaṃ akusalañca appītikaṃ akusalañca dhammaṃ paṭicca sappītiko akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.  (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.13:120.1.pli: Hetuyā cha, ārammaṇe cha …pe… avigate cha. (Saṅkhittaṃ. Kusalasadisaṃ. Sahajātavāropi …pe… pañhāvāropi vitthāretabbā.)

patthana3.13:121.1.pli: Sappītikaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sappītiko abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.

patthana3.13:122.1.pli: Appītikaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca appītiko abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.

patthana3.13:123.1.pli: Sappītikaṃ abyākatañca appītikaṃ abyākatañca dhammaṃ paṭicca sappītiko abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.13:124.1.pli: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe nava …pe… purejāte cha, āsevane cha …pe… avigate nava. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.13:125.1.pli: Nahetuyā nava, naārammaṇe tīṇi, naadhipatiyā nava …pe… napurejāte napacchājāte naāsevane nava. Nakamme cattāri, navipāke nava, naāhāre ekaṃ, naindriye ekaṃ, najhāne ekaṃ, namagge nava, nasampayutte tīṇi, navippayutte cha …pe… novigate tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṃ. Sahajātavārādi vitthāretabbo.)

patthana3.13:126.1.pli: Sappītiko abyākato dhammo sappītikassa abyākatassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.13:127.1.pli: Hetuyā cattāri, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā nava, anantare nava …pe… (sabbattha nava), upanissaye nava, purejāte tīṇi, pacchājāte tīṇi, āsevane nava, kamme cattāri, vipāke nava, āhāre cattāri, indriye cattāri, jhāne nava, magge cattāri, sampayutte cha, vippayutte pañca, atthiyā nava …pe… avigate nava. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.13:128.1.pli: Pītisahagataṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …pe…. (Kusalampi akusalampi abyākatampi sappītikadukasadisaṃ.)

patthana3.13:129.1.pli: Sukhasahagataṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …pe…. (Kusalampi akusalampi abyākatampi sappītikadukasadisaṃ. Akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …pe… paccanīye nahetuyā ekaṃ. Abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …pe… paccanīye nahetuyā nava …pe… najhāne cha, kātabbā. Paccanīye pañhāvāre kusalākusale indriye jhāne cha, pañhāvāre abyākate nava.)

patthana3.13:130.1.pli: Upekkhāsahagataṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …pe… cha. (Sappītikadukasadisaṃ, upekkhāti nānāupekkhā abyākate. Paccanīye nahetuyā nava, najhāne cha.)

patthana3.13:131.1.pli: Upekkhāsahagataṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca upekkhāsahagato akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.13:133.1.pli: Upekkhāsahagataṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca upekkhāsahagato akusalo dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā.

patthana3.13:134.1.pli: Naupekkhāsahagataṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca upekkhāsahagato akusalo dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā.

patthana3.13:135.1.pli: Upekkhāsahagatañca naupekkhāsahagatañca dhammaṃ paṭicca upekkhāsahagato akusalo dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā.  (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.13:136.1.pli: Nahetuyā tīṇi, naadhipatiyā cha …pe… navippayutte cha. (Saṅkhittaṃ. Evaṃ sabbattha akusalaṃ vitthāretabbaṃ. Sappītikadukasadisaṃ.)

patthana3.13:137.1.pli: Upekkhāsahagataṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca upekkhāsahagato abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā nava pañhā. (Sappītikadukaabyākatasadisaṃ. Pañhāvāre kusalākusale indriye jhāne cha, abyākate nava.)

patthana3.13:138.1.pli: Kāmāvacaraṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kāmāvacaro kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.

patthana3.13:139.1.pli: Nakāmāvacaraṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nakāmāvacaro kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.  (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.13:140.1.pli: Hetuyā dve, ārammaṇe dve (sabbattha dve), avigate dve. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.13:143.1.pli: Kāmāvacaro kusalo dhammo kāmāvacarassa kusalassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.

patthana3.13:144.1.pli: Nakāmāvacaro kusalo dhammo nakāmāvacarassa kusalassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.  (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.13:145.1.pli: Hetuyā dve, ārammaṇe cattāri, adhipatiyā tīṇi (kāmāvacare ekaṃ, nakāmāvacare dve), anantare tīṇi (kāmāvacare dve, nakāmāvacare ekaṃ) …pe… sahajāte dve …pe… upanissaye cattāri, āsevane tīṇi, kamme dve, āhāre dve …pe… natthiyā tīṇi …pe… avigate dve. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.13:146.1.pli: Kāmāvacaraṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kāmāvacaro akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.13:147.1.pli: Hetuyā ekaṃ, ārammaṇe ekaṃ …pe… avigate ekaṃ. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.13:149.1.pli: Kāmāvacaraṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kāmāvacaro abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.

patthana3.13:150.1.pli: Nakāmāvacaraṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nakāmāvacaro abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.

patthana3.13:151.1.pli: Kāmāvacaraṃ abyākatañca nakāmāvacaraṃ abyākatañca dhammaṃ paṭicca kāmāvacaro abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.13:152.1.pli: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe cattāri, adhipatiyā pañca …pe… aññamaññe cha …pe… purejāte dve, āsevane dve …pe… avigate nava. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.13:153.1.pli: Nahetuyā ekaṃ, naārammaṇe tīṇi, naadhipatiyā nava …pe… nakamme dve, navipāke pañca, naāhāre ekaṃ, naindriye ekaṃ, najhāne ekaṃ, namagge ekaṃ, nasampayutte tīṇi, navippayutte dve, nonatthiyā tīṇi, novigate tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṃ. Sahajātavārādi vitthāretabbo.)

patthana3.13:154.1.pli: Kāmāvacaro abyākato dhammo kāmāvacarassa abyākatassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.

patthana3.13:155.1.pli: Nakāmāvacaro abyākato dhammo nakāmāvacarassa abyākatassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo … tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.13:156.1.pli: Hetuyā cattāri, ārammaṇe cattāri, adhipatiyā cattāri (kāmāvacare ekaṃ, nakāmāvacare tīṇi, kāmāvacare sahajātādhipatiyeva), anantare cattāri, samanantare cattāri, sahajāte satta, aññamaññe cha, nissaye satta, upanissaye cattāri, purejāte dve, pacchājāte dve, āsevane tīṇi, kamme cattāri, vipāke cattāri, āhāre cattāri …pe… sampayutte dve, vippayutte tīṇi, atthiyā satta, natthiyā cattāri …pe… avigate satta. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.13:157.1.pli: Rūpāvacaraṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca rūpāvacaro kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.

patthana3.13:158.1.pli: Narūpāvacaraṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca narūpāvacaro kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.  (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.13:159.1.pli: Hetuyā dve, ārammaṇe dve. (Sabbattha dve, saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.13:160.1.pli: Naadhipatiyā dve …pe… napurejāte ekaṃ, naāsevane ekaṃ …pe… navippayutte ekaṃ. (Saṅkhittaṃ. Sahajātavārādi vitthāretabbo.)

patthana3.13:161.1.pli: Rūpāvacaro kusalo dhammo rūpāvacarassa kusalassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.

patthana3.13:162.1.pli: Narūpāvacaro kusalo dhammo narūpāvacarassa kusalassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.  (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.13:163.1.pli: Hetuyā dve, ārammaṇe cattāri, adhipatiyā tīṇi (rūpāvacare ekaṃ, sahajātādhipatiyeva, narūpāvacare dve), anantare tīṇi (rūpāvacare ekaṃ, narūpāvacare dve), samanantare tīṇi, sahajāte dve …pe… upanissaye cattāri, āsevane tīṇi, kamme dve …pe… atthiyā dve, natthiyā tīṇi …pe… avigate dve. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.13:164.1.pli: Narūpāvacaraṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca narūpāvacaro akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Sabbattha ekaṃ.)

patthana3.13:165.1.pli: Rūpāvacaraṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca rūpāvacaro abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.

patthana3.13:166.1.pli: Narūpāvacaraṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca narūpāvacaro abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.

patthana3.13:167.1.pli: Rūpāvacaraṃ abyākatañca narūpāvacaraṃ abyākatañca dhammaṃ paṭicca rūpāvacaro abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.13:168.1.pli: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe cattāri, adhipatiyā pañca …pe… purejāte āsevane dve …pe… avigate nava. (Saṅkhittaṃ. Yathā kāmāvacaradukaabyākatasadisaṃ, ettakāyeva pañhā heṭṭhuparikaṃ parivattanti. Sahajātavārampi …pe… pañhāvārampi sabbattha vitthāretabbaṃ.)

patthana3.13:169.1.pli: Arūpāvacaraṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca arūpāvacaro kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.

patthana3.13:170.1.pli: Naarūpāvacaraṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naarūpāvacaro kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.  (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.13:171.1.pli: Hetuyā dve, ārammaṇe dve …pe… avigate dve. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.13:172.1.pli: Naadhipatiyā dve …pe… naāsevane ekaṃ …pe… navippayutte dve. (Saṅkhittaṃ. Sahajātavārādi vitthāretabbo.)

patthana3.13:173.1.pli: Arūpāvacaro kusalo dhammo arūpāvacarassa kusalassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.

patthana3.13:174.1.pli: Naarūpāvacaro kusalo dhammo naarūpāvacarassa kusalassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.  (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.13:175.1.pli: Hetuyā dve, ārammaṇe tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi, anantare tīṇi …pe… sahajāte dve …pe… upanissaye cattāri, āsevane tīṇi, kamme dve …pe… atthiyā dve, natthiyā tīṇi …pe… avigate dve. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.13:176.1.pli: Naarūpāvacaraṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naarūpāvacaro akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṃ. (Sabbattha ekaṃ, saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.13:177.1.pli: Arūpāvacaraṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca arūpāvacaro abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.

patthana3.13:178.1.pli: Naarūpāvacaraṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naarūpāvacaro abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.

patthana3.13:179.1.pli: Arūpāvacaraṃ abyākatañca naarūpāvacaraṃ abyākatañca dhammaṃ paṭicca naarūpāvacaro abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.  (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.13:180.1.pli: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve, adhipatiyā pañca …pe… avigate pañca. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.13:181.1.pli: Nahetuyā ekaṃ, naārammaṇe tīṇi, naadhipatiyā dve …pe… napurejāte cattāri, napacchājāte naāsevane pañca, nakamme dve, navipāke pañca, naāhāre ekaṃ …pe… navippayutte dve …pe… novigate tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṃ. Sahajātavārādi vitthāretabbo.)

patthana3.13:182.1.pli: Arūpāvacaro abyākato dhammo arūpāvacarassa abyākatassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.

patthana3.13:183.1.pli: Naarūpāvacaro abyākato dhammo naarūpāvacarassa abyākatassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.  (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.13:184.1.pli: Hetuyā cattāri, ārammaṇe tīṇi (arūpāvacaramūle dve, naarūpāvacare ekaṃ), adhipatiyā cattāri (arūpāvacaramūle tīṇi, naarūpe ekaṃ), anantare cattāri …pe… sahajāte pañca, aññamaññe dve, nissaye satta, upanissaye cattāri, purejāte dve, pacchājāte dve, āsevane tīṇi, kamme cattāri, vipāke dve …pe… sampayutte dve, vippayutte tīṇi, atthiyā satta, natthiyā cattāri …pe… avigate satta. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.13:185.1.pli: Pariyāpannaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca pariyāpanno kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.

patthana3.13:186.1.pli: Apariyāpannaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca apariyāpanno kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.  (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.13:187.1.pli: Hetuyā dve, ārammaṇe dve …pe… avigate dve. (Saṅkhittaṃ. Lokiyadukakusalasadisaṃ. Sahajātavāropi …pe… pañhāvāropi vitthāretabbā.)

patthana3.13:188.1.pli: Pariyāpannaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca pariyāpanno akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.13:189.1.pli: Hetuyā ekaṃ, ārammaṇe ekaṃ …pe… avigate ekaṃ. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.13:191.1.pli: Pariyāpannaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca pariyāpanno abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.

patthana3.13:192.1.pli: Apariyāpannaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca apariyāpanno abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.

patthana3.13:193.1.pli: Pariyāpannaṃ abyākatañca apariyāpannaṃ abyākatañca dhammaṃ paṭicca pariyāpanno abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.  (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.13:194.1.pli: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve …pe… avigate pañca. (Saṅkhittaṃ. Lokiyadukaabyākatasadisaṃ. Sahajātavārampi …pe… pañhāvārampi sabbattha vitthāretabbaṃ.)

patthana3.13:195.1.pli: Niyyānikaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca niyyāniko kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.

patthana3.13:196.1.pli: Aniyyānikaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca aniyyāniko kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.  (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.13:197.1.pli: Hetuyā dve, ārammaṇe dve …pe… avigate dve. (Saṅkhittaṃ. Lokiyadukasadisaṃ. Sahajātavārampi …pe… pañhāvārampi vitthāretabbaṃ.)

patthana3.13:198.1.pli: Aniyyānikaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca aniyyāniko akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.  (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.13:199.1.pli: Hetuyā ekaṃ, ārammaṇe ekaṃ …pe… avigate ekaṃ. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.13:201.1.pli: Aniyyānikaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca aniyyāniko abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.  (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.13:202.1.pli: Hetuyā ekaṃ, ārammaṇe ekaṃ …pe… avigate ekaṃ. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.13:204.1.pli: Niyataṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca niyato kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.

patthana3.13:205.1.pli: Aniyataṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca aniyato kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.  (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.13:206.1.pli: Hetuyā dve, ārammaṇe dve …pe… avigate dve. (Saṅkhittaṃ. Lokiyadukakusalasadisaṃ. Sahajātavārampi …pe… pañhāvārampi vitthāretabbaṃ.)

patthana3.13:207.1.pli: Niyataṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca niyato akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.

patthana3.13:208.1.pli: Aniyataṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca aniyato akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.  (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.13:209.1.pli: Hetuyā dve, ārammaṇe dve (sabbattha dve), avigate dve. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.13:210.1.pli: Nahetuyā ekaṃ, naadhipatiyā dve, napurejāte ekaṃ …pe… nakamme dve …pe… navippayutte ekaṃ. (Saṅkhittaṃ. Sahajātavārādi vitthāretabbo.)

patthana3.13:211.1.pli: Niyato akusalo dhammo niyatassa akusalassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.

patthana3.13:212.1.pli: Aniyato akusalo dhammo aniyatassa akusalassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.  (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.13:213.1.pli: Hetuyā dve, ārammaṇe tīṇi, adhipatiyā dve (niyate sahajātādhipati, dutiye ārammaṇādhipati sahajātādhipati), anantare dve …pe… nissaye dve, upanissaye tīṇi, āsevane dve, kamme dve …pe… avigate dve. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.13:214.1.pli: Aniyataṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca aniyato abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.13:215.1.pli: Hetuyā ekaṃ, ārammaṇe ekaṃ …pe… avigate ekaṃ. (Saṅkhittaṃ. Sahajātavārepi …pe… pañhāvārepi sabbattha ekaṃ.)

patthana3.13:216.1.pli: Sauttaraṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sauttaro kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.

patthana3.13:217.1.pli: Anuttaraṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca anuttaro kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.  (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.13:218.1.pli: Hetuyā dve, ārammaṇe dve …pe… avigate dve. (Saṅkhittaṃ. Sahajātavāropi …pe… pañhāvāropi sabbattha vitthāretabbā.)

patthana3.13:219.1.pli: Sauttaraṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sauttaro akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.13:220.1.pli: Hetuyā ekaṃ, ārammaṇe ekaṃ …pe… avigate ekaṃ. (Saṅkhittaṃ. Sahajātavārepi …pe… pañhāvārepi sabbattha ekaṃ.)

patthana3.13:221.1.pli: Sauttaraṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sauttaro abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.

patthana3.13:222.1.pli: Anuttaraṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca anuttaro abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.

patthana3.13:223.1.pli: Sauttaraṃ abyākatañca anuttaraṃ abyākatañca dhammaṃ paṭicca sauttaro abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.  (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.13:224.1.pli: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve …pe… avigate pañca. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.13:226.1.pli: Araṇaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca araṇo kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.13:227.1.pli: Hetuyā ekaṃ, ārammaṇe ekaṃ …pe… avigate ekaṃ. (Saṅkhittaṃ. Sahajātavārepi …pe… pañhāvārepi sabbattha ekaṃ.)

patthana3.13:228.1.pli: Saraṇaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca saraṇo akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.13:229.1.pli: Hetuyā ekaṃ, ārammaṇe ekaṃ …pe… avigate ekaṃ. (Saṅkhittaṃ. Sahajātavārepi …pe… pañhāvārepi sabbattha ekaṃ.)

patthana3.13:230.1.pli: Araṇaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca araṇo abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.13:231.1.pli: Hetuyā ekaṃ, ārammaṇe ekaṃ …pe… avigate ekaṃ. (Saṅkhittaṃ. Sahajātavārepi …pe… sampayuttavārepi sabbattha ekaṃ.)

patthana3.13:232.1.pli: Araṇo abyākato dhammo araṇassa abyākatassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.13:233.1.pli: Hetuyā ekaṃ, ārammaṇe ekaṃ …pe… avigate ekaṃ. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)
